content: daphne her limbs grew numb and heavy her soft breasts were closed with delicate bark her hair was leaves her arms were branches and her head became a tree top everything gone except her grace her shining wrote ovid describing daphne as she turned into a laurel tree to escape from apollo these lace laurel leaves give comfort and warmth without turning you into a tree yarn four balls of debbie bliss alpaca silk or any yarn you d like to use since it s a scarf you can take liberties with the gauge and final size this scarf is 67 inches long and 7 inches wide needles us 7 4 5 mm for a gauge of four stitches in an inch and four row in an inch cast on 30 stitches repeat the next 24 row 12 times or until the scarf is as long as you want it to be at the end bind off and weave in ends row 1 p2 k5 p5 k4 p3 k9 p2 row 2 k2 p7 p2tog increase 1 k2 p4 k2 yo k1 yo k2 p5 k2 row 3 p2 k5 p7 k4 p2 k1 p1 k8 p2 row 4 k2 p6 p2tog k1 increase 1 ps k2 p4 k3 yo k1 yo k3 p5 k2 row 5 p2 k5 p9 k4 p2 k2 p1 k7 p2 row 6 k2 p5 p2tog k1 increase 1 ps p1 k2 p4 ssk k5 k2tog p5 k2 row 7 p2 k5 p7 k4 p2 k3 p1 k6 p2 row 8 k2 p4 p2tog k1 increase 1 ps p2 k2 p4 ssk k3 k2tog p5 k2 row 9 p2 k5 p5 k4 p2 k4 p1 k5 p2 row 10 k2 p5 yo k1 yo p4 k2 p4 ssk k1 k2tog p5 k2 row 11 p2 k5 p3 k4 p2 k4 p3 k5 p2 row 12 k2 p5 k1 yo twice k1 p4 k1 m1 k1 p2tog p2 sk2p p5 k2 row 13 p2 k9 p3 k4 p5 k5 p2 row 14 k2 p5 k2 yo k1 yo k2 p4 k1 increase 1 k1 p2tog p7 k2 row 15 p2 k8 p1 k1 p2 k4 p7 k5 p2 row 16 k2 p5 k3 yo k1 yo k3 p4 k2 increase 1 ps k1 p2tog p6 k2 row 17 p2 k7 p1 k2 p2 k4 p9 k5 p2 row 18 k2 p5 ssk k5 k2tog p4 k2 p1 increase 1 ps k1 p2tog p5 k2 row 19 p2 k6 p1 k3 p2 k4 p7 k5 p2 row 20 k2 p5 ssk k3 k2tog p4 k2 p2 increase 1 ps k1 p2tog p4 k2 row 21 p2 k5 p1 k4 p2 k4 p5 k5 p2 row 22 k2 p5 ssk k1 k2tog p4 k2 p4 yo k1 yo p5 k2 row 23 p2 k5 p3 k4 p2 k4 p3 k5 p2 row 24 k2 p5 sk2p p2 p2tog k1 m1 k1 p4 k1 yo twice k1 p5 k2 copyright 2011 saranac hale spencer and the defarge knittery all
